@graph.name: Annapurna Circuit Trek
@graph.description: The Annapurna Circuit Trek is a legendary 19-day Himalayan journey encircling the Annapurna Massif, crossing the iconic Thorong La Pass (5,416 m), and transitioning from lush subtropical valleys to high-altitude alpine deserts.

priceSpecification.name: Standard Package - varies by group size

provider.name: Hi Nepal Travels & Treks Pvt. Ltd.

itinerary.name: Arrival in Kathmandu (1,300m)
itinerary.description: Airport pickup, transfer to hotel in Thamel, and pre-trek briefing.

itinerary.name: Drive to Jagat (1,340m)
itinerary.description: 8–10 hours scenic drive passing through rural villages and rivers.

itinerary.name: Trek to Dharapani (1,860m)
itinerary.description: Walk through terraced fields and waterfalls following the Marsyangdi River.

itinerary.name: Trek to Chame (2,650m)
itinerary.description: Trek through pine forests with views of Annapurna II and Lamjung Himal.

itinerary.name: Trek to Pisang (3,250m)
itinerary.description: Entering alpine terrain with dramatic rock formations and Tibetan Buddhist culture.

itinerary.name: Trek to Ngawal (3,660m) via High Trail
itinerary.description: Panoramic trail via Ghyaru offering some of the best mountain views of the circuit.

itinerary.name: Acclimatization in Manang (3,518m)
itinerary.description: Essential rest day with optional hikes to Ice Lake or Milarepa Cave.

itinerary.name: Trek to Thorong Phedi (4,450m)
itinerary.description: Steady uphill climb preparing for the pass crossing the next day.

itinerary.name: Cross Thorong La Pass (5,416m) to Muktinath
itinerary.description: Challenging 7–9 hour crossing of the world's highest trekking pass.

itinerary.name: Drive to Tatopani (1,190m)
itinerary.description: Drive through Kali Gandaki Valley and relax in natural hot springs.

itinerary.name: Sunrise at Poon Hill (3,210m)
itinerary.description: Early morning hike for a spectacular Himalayan sunrise over the Dhaulagiri and Annapurna ranges.

itinerary.name: Return to Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Drive or fly back to the capital for a farewell cultural dinner.

mainEntity.name: How long does the Annapurna Circuit Trek take?

acceptedAnswer.text: The Annapurna Circuit Trek typically takes 15 to 19 days, depending on the route, acclimatization days, and side trips like Tilicho Lake or Poon Hill.

mainEntity.name: What is the highest point of the Annapurna Circuit Trek?

acceptedAnswer.text: The highest point of the trek is Thorong La Pass, which stands at an elevation of 5,416 meters above sea level.

mainEntity.name: Is a guide mandatory for the Annapurna Circuit Trek?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, hiring a licensed guide is mandatory to ensure safety and to comply with local regulations for trekking in the Annapurna region.
